author: Ashley Carman
title: Therapists are offering support on Instagram through cute posts and live streams
description: Therapists are using Instagram to help people work through their COVID-19 anxiety. They’re going live, partnering with influencers, and designing posts specifically for the pandemic.
content:
Pandemic mental health advice for the masses
Jamie Castillo, Alyssa Lia Mancao
Instagram Live therapy sessions can be jarring. An iPhone ping occasionally goes off, the therapist forgets to turn off the press conference she was watching before going live, o… [+6413 chars]
